name: RedLine Zipcode
description: The Zip Code API provides the following functions: Distance Between Zip Code API - The API allows you to quickly and easily figure out the distance between zip codes.Zip Codes in Radius API - You can use this API to find all zip codes within a given radius from another zip code.Zip Code to City and State API and Zip Code to Latitude/Longitude API - The API can convert a zip code to the primary location for the zip code. This includes the city, state, latitude, and longitude for the primary lo...

api_methods.name: Multiple Zip Codes to Location Information
api_methods.description: Returns location information for multiple zip codes (up to 100).  This information includes city, state, latitude, longitude, and time zone information.  It also contains a list of other acceptable city names for the locations.  **Each zip code provided will count as a separate request.** For example, if you send 5 zip codes, you will be charged for 5 requests.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the city and state information for the zip codes 90210, 10001, and 30301 in degrees?
I need the location details for zip codes 33109, 60614, and 94105 using radians.

I want the location details for zip codes 10018, 20005, and 33139 using degrees.
Can you tell me the cities and states for zip codes 60611, 94111, and 30309 in radians?
Provide the location information for zip codes 75205, 02116, and 33140 using degrees.
What are the location details for zip codes 98109, 10022, and 20036 in radians?
I need the city and state information for zip codes 30305, 33133, and 94123 using degrees.

api_methods.name: Multiple Zip Codes by Radius
api_methods.description: Use this API to find all zip codes within a given radius of multiple zip codes.  Each line is charged as a separate request.

parameters.name: zip_codes
parameters.description: Zip codes (one per line; max 100).  You may only send one of zip_codes or addrs.

parameters.name: addrs
parameters.description: Addresses (one per line; max 100).  E.g. "123 Main St. Moorestown NJ 08057".  Each line is charged as a separate request.
